books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Cullen Post, a lawyer and Episcopal minister, antagonizes some ruthless killers when he takes on a wrongful conviction case.
books.name: THE GUARDIANS

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Children with special talents are abducted and sequestered in an institution where the sinister staff seeks to extract their gifts through harsh methods.
books.name: THE INSTITUTE

books.author: by Andrzej Sapkowski
books.description: Linked stories follow the exploits of Geralt of Rivia, a monster-slaying mercenary.
books.name: THE LAST WISH

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Harry Bosch and Renée Ballard return to take up a case that held the attention of Bosch’s mentor.
books.name: THE NIGHT FIRE

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: The 27th book in the Alex Cross series. Copycat crimes make the detective question whether an innocent man was executed.
books.name: CRISS CROSS

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher gets caught up in a turf war between Ukrainian and Albanian gangs.
books.name: BLUE MOON

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: When Atlee Pine returns to her hometown to investigate her sister’s kidnapping from 30 years ago, she winds up tracking a potential serial killer.
books.name: A MINUTE TO MIDNIGHT

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a sequel to “The Handmaid’s Tale,” old secrets bring three women together as the Republic of Gilead’s theocratic regime shows signs of decay.
books.name: THE TESTAMENTS

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: A sibling relationship is impacted when the family goes from poverty to wealth and back again over the course of many decades.
books.name: THE DUTCH HOUSE

books.author: by Andrzej Sapkowski
books.description: The first book in the Witcher series. As war looms, Geralt of Rivia must protect the prophesied savior of the world.
books.name: BLOOD OF ELVES

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A young man who was gifted with a mysterious power becomes part of a war between slavers and the enslaved.
books.name: THE WATER DANCER

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.
books.name: THE GIVER OF STARS
